text:
Just spent my lunch break helping a three-eyed cat escape Microsoft Office tools.

No, Iâ€™m not losing it. This isâ€˜s new browser game â€œEscape the Officeâ€ and itâ€™s oddly therapeutic.

The Concept:
You play as Mr. Peepers (the cat) literally running away from corporate meetings, PowerPoint presentations, and Excel spreadsheets to reach vacation paradise.

Having spent 3 years at Microsoft, dodging endless status meetings and fighting with PowerPoint formatting, this game feels like my actual experience.

Every obstacle you dodge represents the tools that slow us down:
â€¢ Legacy PowerPoint templates
â€¢ Endless formatting strugglesâ€¢ Death by a thousand status updates
â€¢ Meetings that couldâ€™ve been emails

The faster you collect Gamma power-ups in the game, the quicker you escape to vacation mode. Just like real life - Gamma helps me finish presentations in minutes instead of hours.

Started in a gray corporate cubicle (triggering Microsoft flashbacks), collected Gamma boosts, and watched the world transform into a sunny beach paradise.

The best part? Collect 5 in-game hats and Gamma ships you a real â€œOut of Officeâ€ hat. Iâ€™m definitely going for it.

This isnâ€™t about hating work. Itâ€™s about working smarter so you can actually log off and enjoy life.

Since using Gamma, Iâ€™ve gone from spending entire weekends on presentations to finishing them during coffee breaks.

Less time in Office tools = More time out of office.

Try escaping here:
